Posts.Content: I had biopsies done on 8th February. My cancer is oestrogen sensitive. I’m not due to have my lumpectomy until 5th March. I’m experiencing a fair bit of pain in the breast. Is this still from the biopsies, I had 5, or is there else something wrong.
Posts.Title: Pain after tests and diagnosis and before surgery.

Posts.Content: I had my wide local incision last Tuesday. I wasn’t given any specific instructions on after care. People have told me things like, can’t drive for 6 weeks, can’t lift anything ever. Where can I get the proper advice. I’ve tried some websites but can’t find anything specific.
Posts.Title: After surgery advice
